divs: sighting detailson 7\1\2013 at 10:35 pm pt i was driving northbound on hwy. 101 between novato, ca and petaluma, ca when i witnessed 2 enormous spacecraft on the east side of hwy. 101 hovering for 15 minutes. the spacecraft closest to the highway (approximately 300 yards east of hwy. 101 & approximately 500 feet in the air) was outlined in white lights with rotating circular colored lights near the front of the aircraft. they were not helicoptors or airplanes.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Petaluma
There were no other sightings in Petaluma on or around July 1st 2013
Summary: I witnessed 2 enourmous spacecraft hovering just east of Hwy. 101 between Novato, CA & Petaluma CA.
